javadoc:
This class represents the set of "or-able" filter conditions for a single column.
@param <T> the column type.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new DialogFilterCondtionSet for a specific Column.

params.name: filterRow
params.comment: the DialogFilterRow that created this DialogFilterConditionSet.

params.name: columnFilterData
params.comment: the data for the column this condition set is tied to.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructor used when building from an existing table model

params.name: filterRow
params.comment: the FilterRow that created this DialogFilterConditionSet.

params.name: columnFilter
params.comment: the ColumnFilter from the existing TableFilter to build from.

methods.name: addToTableFilter
methods.comment: Adds a column filter to the TableColumnFilter that matches this configuration.

params.name: logicOperation
params.comment:
the logic operation for how this set of filter conditions will
 be combined with previous sets of conditions.

methods.javadoc:
Returns a ColumnDataSource that provide access to the columns values for each row.
@return a ColumnDataSource for the column.
methods.name: getColumnData
methods.comment: Returns a ColumnDataSource that provide access to the columns values for each row.

name: DialogFilterConditionSet
comment: This class represents the set of "or-able" filter conditions for a single column.
